column4: Does anyone know how I make Amarok play WMA's and MP3's? It refuses to :(
Install Ubuntu Restricted Extras in add/remove
you have ALL Avail applications showing?
Well, it shows up for me
You need to use http://www.medibuntu.org/ for feisty. But upgrade.
I prefer not to upgrade as Gutsy refuses to start when it's installed it simply won't start :S
